content.en: Cancer immunotherapy advancements: Scientists have used algorithms to investigate various aspects of head and neck cancer. They have used the CIBERSORT method to analyze the differences in immune phenotypes between different tumor tissues. Additionally, algorithms such as Cell type identification via estimating relative subset of known RNA transcripts (CIBERSORT) and immunophenoscore (IPS) have been used to predict immunotherapy efficacy and stratify prognosis of patients. These findings help researchers understand the role of immune cells and genes in the development and treatment of head and neck cancer.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for kræftimmunterapi: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at undersøge forskellige aspekter af hoved- og halskræft. De har anvendt CIBERSORT-metoden til at analysere forskelle i immune fænotyper mellem forskellige tumorer. Desuden er algoritmer såsom Cell type identification via estimating relative subset of known RNA transcripts (CIBERSORT) og immunophenoscore (IPS) blevet brugt til at forudsige effektiviteten af immunterapi og stratificere prognosen for patienter. Disse fund hjælper forskere med at forstå immuncellers og -geners rolle i udviklingen og behandlingen af hoved- og halskræft.
